com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.core.actions
Class Repeat

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions.AbstractAction
      com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.core.actions.Repeat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action
public class Repeat
extends AbstractAction

Invokes its body a number of times.

The body is invoked in its own scope (prefixed "repeat"); information about the current loop will be available in that scope.

Field Summary
static String DEFAULT_INFORMATION_NAME
          The name of the variable that will contain information about the current loop when none is given.
static String REPEAT_SCOPE
          The name prefixes of the scopes that will be used for repeat actions.

setCount

public void setCount(int count)
Sets the number of times that the body should be invoked.

Parameters:
count - the repeat count

setInformationName

public void setInformationName(String informationName)
Sets the name of the variable that will contain loop information. The default information name is "loop".

Parameters:
informationName - the variable name to use for information about the current loop

execute

public void execute(Context context,
                    Writer writer)
             throws ActionException,
                    ContextException,
                    WriterException
Description copied from interface: Action
Executes this action.

Parameters:
context - the context to execute in
writer - the writer to use
Throws:
ActionException - when the action can't be executed
ContextException - when something goes wrong while using the context
WriterException - when something goes wrong while using the writer
